website_summaries.verdict: A unique scooter that is also a mini bike; easy to assemble and ride. A great choice for anyone who likes the 2-in-1 capabilities.
pros: Stands out for its innovative design that can be easily transformed into a mini bike
Assembly isn't too difficult, and handlebar is easy to adjust
Can reach speeds up to 10 mph

customer_reviews.title: Battery life not even close to as advertised
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my 8 year old son. He's 80 pounds, thus well under the maximum weight. After following the instructions to charge the battery only lasts about 2 minutes. I've gone through the troubleshooting guide to no avail. I've tried contacting the manufacturer with absolutely no follow up, not even an automated message. This thing is a rip off.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely low quality

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed

I think it would have been less of a hassle to just buy them separately (one bike and one scooter). Also it is pretty loud while riding on flat ground. It doesn't sound like it is going to last long but we will see.

customer_reviews.text: We tried to give this as a gift for Christmas but it was sold out. But got to order it for his 11th birthday. My son loves to ride it, even my teenager.

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for your kids!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it. It shipped super fast and was here before Christmas. Easy to assemble. But it did take a little bit to figure out how to adjust the seat to go from scooter to bike. But once we figured it out, it was well good. Definitely happy with this purchase!

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your time or money. We've had 2 since December and both have stopped working with minimal use. Piece of junk. Very disappointing.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a christmas present for my son, and he loves it! It does go a little fast for him, so it took some time to get used to it. But overall, it was a great buy.

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool but......
